content:
I'm glad to hear that Rachel from Japan Explorers recommended Hyperdia! However, I must clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have personal experiences or interactions with specific travel agencies or individuals. I provide general information and answer questions to the best of my knowledge based on my training data.

As a conversational AI, I don't have any information about Japan Explorers or Rachel, and I didn't know that you booked your trip with them until you mentioned it. I'm here to provide general advice and answer questions about Japan, travel, and culture, but I'm not affiliated with any specific travel agency or tour operator.

That being said, it's great that Rachel recommended Hyperdia, which is a well-known and reliable resource for navigating Japan's train system. I'm sure you'll find it helpful during your trip! If you have any more questions or concerns about Japan or your trip, feel free to ask!
